puri.name: Puri Beach
puri.description: Puri Beach is one of the finest beaches in Eastern India. Known for its spiritual significance and natural beauty, this beach attracts millions of visitors annually. The golden sands stretch for kilometers along the Bay of Bengal, offering spectacular sunrise views and religious importance due to its proximity to the Jagannath Temple.
puri.bestTimeToVisit: October to February when the weather is pleasant with temperatures ranging from 15°C to 28°C
puri.howToReach: Nearest airport is Biju Patnaik International Airport, Bhubaneswar (60 km). Regular trains connect Puri to major cities. Well-connected by road network.

accommodation.luxury: Premium hotels with ocean view from ₹5000/night

tips: Early morning visits recommended for photography

kovalam.name: Kovalam Beach
kovalam.description: Kovalam is an internationally renowned beach destination featuring three adjacent crescent beaches. The southernmost, Lighthouse Beach, is the most popular. Known for its pristine waters and ayurvedic treatments, it offers a perfect blend of leisure and wellness.
kovalam.bestTimeToVisit: September to March when the weather is pleasant and ideal for water activities
kovalam.howToReach: Trivandrum International Airport is just 15 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.

radhanagar.name: Radhanagar Beach
radhanagar.description: Often rated as Asia's best beach, Radhanagar Beach (Beach No. 7) is known for its pristine white sands, turquoise waters, and lush green forest backdrop. This beach offers one of the most spectacular sunset views in India.
radhanagar.bestTimeToVisit: October to May, avoiding monsoon season
radhanagar.howToReach: Fly to Port Blair, then take a ferry to Havelock Island. The beach is 12 km from the jetty.
tips: Visit during early morning or sunset

marina.name: Marina Beach
marina.description: Marina Beach is the second-longest urban beach in the world, stretching for 13 kilometers along the Bay of Bengal. This historic beach features numerous landmarks, monuments, and is a cultural hub of Chennai.
marina.bestTimeToVisit: November to February when the weather is pleasant
marina.howToReach: Chennai International Airport is 15 km away. Well-connected by local transport.

rushikonda.name: Rushikonda Beach
rushikonda.description: Rushikonda Beach is known for its golden sands and clear waters. It is a popular spot for water sports and offers a serene environment for relaxation.
rushikonda.bestTimeToVisit: October to February when the weather is pleasant
rushikonda.howToReach: Visakhapatnam Airport is 20 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

eden.name: Eden Beach
eden.description: Eden Beach is a serene and less-crowded beach in Puducherry. It is known for its clean waters and peaceful environment.
eden.bestTimeToVisit: October to March when the weather is pleasant
eden.howToReach: Puducherry Airport is 10 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

minicoy-thundi.name: Minicoy Thundi Beach
minicoy-thundi.description: Minicoy Thundi Beach is known for its white sands and clear blue waters. It is a popular spot for water sports and offers a serene environment for relaxation.
minicoy-thundi.bestTimeToVisit: October to May when the weather is pleasant
minicoy-thundi.howToReach: Fly to Agatti Airport, then take a boat to Minicoy Island.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

kadmat.name: Kadmat Beach
kadmat.description: Kadmat Beach is known for its pristine white sands and clear blue waters. It is a popular spot for water sports and offers a serene environment for relaxation.
kadmat.bestTimeToVisit: October to May when the weather is pleasant
kadmat.howToReach: Fly to Agatti Airport, then take a boat to Kadmat Island.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

kappad.name: Kappad Beach
kappad.description: Kappad Beach is historically significant as it is the place where Vasco da Gama landed in 1498. It is known for its serene environment and clear waters.
kappad.bestTimeToVisit: October to March when the weather is pleasant
kappad.howToReach: Calicut International Airport is 20 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

kasarkod.name: Kasarkod Beach
kasarkod.description: Kasarkod Beach is known for its clean waters and serene environment. It is a popular spot for relaxation and offers a peaceful getaway.
kasarkod.bestTimeToVisit: October to March when the weather is pleasant
kasarkod.howToReach: Mangalore International Airport is 30 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

padubidri.name: Padubidri Beach
padubidri.description: Padubidri Beach is known for its clean waters and serene environment. It is a popular spot for relaxation and offers a peaceful getaway.
padubidri.bestTimeToVisit: October to March when the weather is pleasant
padubidri.howToReach: Mangalore International Airport is 30 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening

ghoghla.name: Ghoghla Beach
ghoghla.description: Ghoghla Beach is known for its clean waters and serene environment. It is a popular spot for relaxation and offers a peaceful getaway.
ghoghla.bestTimeToVisit: October to March when the weather is pleasant
ghoghla.howToReach: Diu Airport is 10 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening
